Bangalore to Hasan from there 12 km on Arisikere road.
Suitable for a day trip. There are two temples Buchishwara temple built by the Hoysalas which is in good condition and other one built by the Cholas in ruins.
Pl go there by your own vehicle and you can visit Mosale also which is about 20 KM from this place where Nageshwara and Soumyakeshava temples are situated.
